Opens Up About Mistakes in Iraq( CBS) Former Secretary of Defense Donald Rumsfeld has just published a memoir titled`` Known and Unknown.'' The title comes from his famous remark that in military intelligence there are known knowns, known unknowns, and unknown unknowns.
